definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: May I have your name again,please.
Would you like to use ampoule?
sentences.chinese: 請問你喜歡加精華素嗎？

sentences.english: C. Sorry , I don"t know Pleaseask the policeman over there."
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我不知道，請問那邊的警察。

sentences.english: Sir, would you like to pay in cash or sign your bill?
sentences.chinese: 先生，請問您是用現金結賬還是簽單啊？

sentences.english: Excuse me. What's the time difference betweeen Beijing and London?
sentences.chinese: 請問北京和倫敦的時差是多少？

sentences.english: Is there any dinning car on the train?
sentences.chinese: 請問這列車上有咐餐廳嗎？

sentences.english: Do you want to pre-register the Following Fair?
sentences.chinese: 請問閣下是否有興趣優先登記以下展覽會？

sentences.english: 12-30 "Please madam, to where may we take you?
sentences.chinese: 夫人，請問，我們該把您送到什麼地方去呢？

sentences.english: Do you have a transfer service from airport to hotel free of charge?
sentences.chinese: 請問貴酒店有沒有免費接機服務？

sentences.english: Please ask you do I want to how learn and then can say that thing that I do out?
sentences.chinese: 請問你我要怎麼學才能把我說的那個東西做出來呀？

sentences.english: Would you like some soup or appetizer to start with you meal ?
sentences.chinese: 請問你要不要先點頭盤或湯？

sentences.english: Could I have your name please?
Does your work environment encourage you to work?
sentences.chinese: 請問你的工作環境能激勵你工作嗎？

sentences.english: Will the first to use contraceptives, "Yasmin", can reduce the dose of their own?
sentences.chinese: 請問初次用避孕藥“優思明”，可否自行減小劑量？

sentences.english: Can I speak to Kylie, please?
sentences.chinese: 請問我可以和凱莉說話嗎？

sentences.english: It's 120 yuan . Would you like to pay in cash or bill it to your room?
sentences.chinese: 一共是120元。請問怎樣付款，付現金還是入房帳？

definition: to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
upstairs/(Internet slang) previous poster in a forum thread
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
